titleStmt.title: The dead prophet yet speaking a funeral sermon preached at Plaisterers-Hall, Feb. 15, 1690, to the Church of Christ there, upon the sad occasion of the decease of their late Reverend Pastor, Mr. John Faldo / by John Quick ...
titleStmt.author: Quick, John, 1636-1706.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Snowden for Thomas Philips ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the National Library of Scotland (Advocates'), Edinburgh.
